data.text: What can I do in my community?
How can I help in my community?

messages.speech: To help in your community, support local businesses and attend town hall meetings to express your advocacy for pro-environmental policies. Organize a group of neighbors to clean up a local park, plant trees, or write letters to your elected officials. You are also encouraged to host a teach-in for your community by making use of the toolkits we have put together at earthday.org/toolkits. What else can I tell you about?
